hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution. (Digit)Stay Sharp, Job SeekersBefore you comment "Interested":Verify the company's official job postings.Be wary of vague job descriptions.Never download unfamiliar apps or click on suspicious links.Remember, LinkedIn is a professional network, not a dating app. A pretty face doesn't guarantee a genuine opportunity.hashtag#Accenture hashtag#Deloitte hashtag#Amazon hashtag#Google hashtag#TCS hashtag#HCLTech hashtag#Wipro hashtag#Cognizant hashtag#Capgemini hashtag#IBM hashtag#Infosys hashtag#Oracle hashtag#DellTechnologies hashtag#Apple hashtag#NotHiringJustSmiling hashtag#LinkedInScam hashtag#FreshersBeware hashtag#PrettyPostNoPaycheck hashtag#DataFarming101 hashtag#FakeProfile

**🚀 hashtag#Pharmacovigilance for Freshers | Part 1 – Introduction to Pharmacovigilance & How to Get Started (2025)**Hello Future Drug Safety Champs!Are you ready to make your mark in the world of **Pharmacovigilance (PV)**?This is the field where **science meets patient safety** — and YOU could be the next rising star in it!hashtag#What is hashtag#Pharmacovigilance (PV)?Pharmacovigilance is defined as the science and activities concerned with the detection, assessment, understanding, and prevention of adverse effects or any other drug-related problems.hashtag#What Do PV Professionals Actually Do?**Here’s what your future self could be working on:**🔎 Monitor adverse drug reactions (ADR)⚠️ Detect drug safety signals📋 Prepare regulatory reports (FDA, EMA, CDSCO)🛡️ Minimize risk through safety strategies✅ Ensure global compliance### Who Can Get into PV?No rocket science here! If you belong to:* B.Pharm / M.Pharm* B.Sc / M.Sc (Biotech, Microbio, Biochem)* MBBS / BDS* Diploma holders with a **certification in PV**You’re eligible to join the PV squad!---### Must-Have Skills to Shine in PV:✅ Attention to detail✅ Clear communication (written + verbal)✅ Analytical mindset✅ Basic knowledge of regulations (FDA, EMA, ICH)✅ Computer skills (databases, safety software)✅ Understanding of clinical trials---### Kickstart Your PV Career in 4 Steps:**Step 1:** Learn the Basics* Understand ADRs, AEs, ICSR, PSUR* Read FDA, EMA, CDSCO, ICH guidelines**Step 2:** Upskill Online* Coursera, EdX – Drug Safety courses* Pharmacovigilance Academy – Free basics* RAPS – Regulatory webinars**Step 3:** Apply for Entry-Level Roles* Pharmacovigilance Associate* Drug Safety Trainee* Clinical Safety Executive* Medical Review Coordinator**Step 4:** Ace the Interview* Know the terms (ICSR, signal detection, risk management)* Understand real-life PV cases---### Top Companies Hiring Freshers:✨ IQVIA✨ Parexel✨ Cognizant Life Sciences✨ Accenture✨ TCS (Life Sciences Division)✨ PRA Health Sciences✨ Dr. Reddy’s✨ Fresenius Kabi✨ Novartis✨ Pharmalex### Pro Tip for Freshers:**Start small. Intern if needed.**Every ADR you code, every signal you detect builds your drug safety expertise.**Coming Soon: Part 2 – Free Resources & Certifications for PV Beginners!**Comment **PV Ready** if you're excited!Share with a friend who needs this push!hashtag#PharmacovigilanceForFreshershashtag#DrugSafetyCareershashtag#LifeScienceJobshashtag#PVReady2025hashtag#PharmaJobshashtag#CareerInPharmacovigilancehashtag#FreshersGuidehashtag#HealthcareCareershashtag#ClinicalResearchCommunityhashtag#MedSafetyMattershashtag#CareerseriesbyAkanksha

hashtag#FreshStartTip – Understanding Talent Acquisition vs. HRAs part of my small initiative to share whatever little I've learned in my career from the HR Tech industry so far, here’s a quick tip that might help freshers and those new to the corporate world—especially if you're exploring roles or networking in the HR Tech space.One of the most common mix-ups I’ve seen  is confusing Talent Acquisition with Human Resources (HR).While they work closely together, their core responsibilities are different:Talent Acquisition (TA) is all about:1. Sourcing, attracting & hiring top talent2. Planning future workforce needs3. Employer branding & recruitment marketingHuman Resources (HR) focuses on:1. Managing employees post-hire2. Handling payroll, policies, and compliance3. Driving engagement, growth, and retentionTA gets you in the door. HR helps you grow inside !! 🚀Understanding this can help you communicate more effectively and build stronger connections within the HR Tech community and broader professional network. !!If you’ve had moments of mixing these up, don’t worry—we’ve all been there. Let’s keep learning and sharing!Hope this helps at least one person out there—that’s a win for me!hashtag#FreshStartTip hashtag#HRTech hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#CareerLearning hashtag#HelpingFreshers hashtag#PeopleOps hashtag#EntryLevelTips hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CustomerSuccess

🌟 Job Market for Fresh MBA Graduates in Chennai – 2025 SnapshotChennai offers a mix of opportunities and competition for fresh MBAs. From IT to manufacturing and digital roles, here’s a quick overview of the 2025 trends.💻 IT & Tech Roles on the RiseChennai’s IT giants like TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, and Workday are major recruiters.Top Roles:Product ManagementBusiness/Data AnalyticsDigital ConsultingMBAs with AI, data skills, or tech backgrounds are preferred.🎯 Specialized MBAs in FocusNiche MBAs are now valued over generalist degrees.Hot Specializations:Business AnalyticsFintech & InsurtechSupply ChainDigital MarketingIIT Madras, LIBA, and Great Lakes offer relevant programs aligned with market needs.🚗 Automotive & Manufacturing RolesAuto majors like Hyundai and Renault-Nissan need MBAs in ops, strategy, and supply chain.EV Boom: EV expansion has sparked demand for MBAs skilled in sustainability and innovation.🚀 Startups & Entrepreneurial RolesChennai’s startup ecosystem—powered by Startup TN—is thriving in fintech, edtech, and healthtech.More MBAs are joining startups or launching ventures, echoing global B-school trends.📲 Surge in Digital MarketingDigital marketing is booming across sectors.Key Roles:SEO, Social MediaPerformance MarketingAnalyticsMBAs familiar with tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics are highly sought after.⚠️ Challenges in Consulting & FinanceTraditional sectors are hiring fewer freshers.Firms like McKinsey have slowed hiring.Banks prioritize experienced or certified hires.Fresh MBAs without internships face tough competition.💰 Salary vs ROIAverage Salaries:₹10–22 LPA from top schools₹4–8 LPA for mid-tier graduatesFees: ₹6–13L — raising ROI concerns, especially outside top colleges.📝 Entrance Scores & NetworkingGetting into top MBA schools needs solid scores:CAT: 80–85%ile (IIT-M)TANCET: 80–95 (Anna Univ)Post-MBA, referrals and alumni events play a big role in landing offers.✅ Final TakeWhile the market is tough, there’s room for smart, skilled MBAs. Focus on:Relevant internshipsIn-demand certificationsStrong networkingThe 2025 outlook is positive for those ready to adapt.hashtag#MBAJobs hashtag#ChennaiCareers hashtag#FreshMBA2025 hashtag#DigitalMarketing hashtag#BusinessAnalytics hashtag#FintechCareers hashtag#EVJobs hashtag#StartupIndia hashtag#IITMadrasMBA hashtag#GreatLakes hashtag#ConsultingCareers hashtag#ChennaiStartups hashtag#ROIConcerns hashtag#TANCET hashtag#CATExam hashtag#MBANetworking hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#SpecializedMBA hashtag#ChennaiJobMarket

🎭 LinkedIn or Linke-done?Ever seen this?👩‍💼 A poised individual in formal attire🏢 Big corporate logo in the background📝 Caption: "We're hiring freshers! Comment 'Interested' to get shortlisted!"But wait... where's the job description? The application link? The actual job?Welcome to the world of LinkedIn Modeling Agency, where:That smile isn't because you're hired—it's because you've just boosted someone's engagement metrics.Your "Interested" comment? It's not leading to a job; it's leading to a data collection spree.The Real Job? Data Collection SpecialistThese posts often lack:Specific job details.Legitimate application links.Any semblance of authenticity.Instead, they're fishing for:Your name.Your email.Your aspirations.All to later pitch you dubious courses or products.But It's Not Just About EngagementSome scams go further. For instance, certain fraudulent job postings have been linked to malware distribution.
